original_title: Jacky Cheung - Wake Up Dreaming Concert
overview: After releasing the album Wake Up Dreaming in late 2014, Jacky Cheung held a small concert at Beijing's National Olympic Sports Center on May 24, 2015. The Wake Up Dreaming Concert only hosted 8,000 audience members at the venue, while its livestream accumulated 50 million views. The concert is now released as a live video album featuring the pop king's impeccable performances of the songs on Wake Up Dreaming and other select hits and medleys.
title: Jacky Cheung - Wake Up Dreaming Concert
